title.rendered: Win More Customers By Speaking On Podcasts

content.rendered:
Overview

Every day, 1000s of your ideal clients listen to podcasts. Yet, most business owners and executives still don’t consider podcasts as a marketing tool and leave so much on the table.

In this webinar, we’re going to share the secrets of how to get yourself booked on industry-relevant podcasts as a guest to attract new customers and build trust at scale.

 

Key Points:

  • Finding the most relevant podcasts for your brand
  • Crafting irresistible pitches to secure bookings
  • Turning listeners into subscribers and clients
  • Creating social media content from each interview
  • Networking with hosts to create opportunities
